text: No muri bo (indyarya), hari ababuza amahoro umuhanuzi (Muhamadi) bavuga bati "We yumva ibyo abwiwe byose". Vuga uti "Yumva ibyiza kuri mwe, akemera Allah, akemera ibyo abwiwe nâ€™abemera, kandi akaba impuhwe kuri babandi bemeye muri mwe". Ariko babandi babuza amahoro Intumwa ya Allah, bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
